price: 48. Le jour (viendra) où la terre sera changée en une autre terre, ainsi que (seront changés) les cieux, et où ils (les hommes) comparaîtront devant Allah, l’Un, le Haut Dominateur.
arabic: يَوۡمَ تُبَدَّلُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ غَيۡرَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُۖ وَبَرَزُواْ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡوَٰحِدِ ٱلۡقَهَّارِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yawma tubaddalu al-arḍu ghayra al-arḍi wal-samāwātu wabarazū lillahi al-wāḥidi al-qahāri
